body_html:
Try this:

pos1.append(f.data)

Also, make the input Variable volatile if you just want to evaluate the network. This can reduce a fairly amount of memory used.

f = model(Variable(mydata[index][0].view(1, 3, 224, 224), volatile=True))
body_text:
Try this:
pos1.append(f.data)

Also, make the input Variable volatile if you just want to evaluate the network. This can reduce a fairly amount of memory used.
f = model(Variable(mydata[index][0].view(1, 3, 224, 224), volatile=True))
body:
Try this:

```
pos1.append(f.data)
```

Also, make the input `Variable` volatile if you just want to evaluate the network. This can reduce a fairly amount of memory used.

```
f = model(Variable(mydata[index][0].view(1, 3, 224, 224), volatile=True))
```
